synopsis.text: Chen Jun is an otaku who finds himself unexpectedly thrust into the role of Emperor over a vast intergalactic empire spanning multiple universes. Though uncertain of his abilities at first, Chen Jun's childhood friend Xu Qianqian and the kingdom's female general Pandora believe he can rise to the challenge. However, the skeptical Empress Sandora watches his every move, expecting him to fail. As Emperor, Chen Jun must balance his gaming hobby with the monumental task of saving not only his own world, but all of the parallel worlds under his rule. Through perseverance and clever problem-solving, he slowly gains the trust of his subjects despite his unorthodox methods. With the help of his quirky band of advisers, Chen Jun proves himself an unconventional yet effective leader. Blending sci-fi and comedy, this lighthearted tale follows an otaku out of his element who must step up to become the unlikely hero of the multiverse. Can Chen Jun successfully juggle his conflicting roles and responsibilities? The fate of countless worlds may just depend on it!
